explains: v. （以暴力）杀死；<美>（尤用于报章）谋杀；<非正式>给（某人）以极深印象，逗乐（某人）

sentences.en: Those old movies still slay me!
sentences.cn: 那些老影片依旧让我着迷！

sentences.en: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.
sentences.cn: 恶人窥探义人，想要杀他。

sentences.en: Her goal: to slay 21 Yankees, one for each year of her beau's life.
sentences.cn: 她的目标：宰掉21个北方佬，21是她情郎的年龄。
